visualization_prompt: Create a Highcharts chartOptions object to render a spline chart with the following specifications: Chart title: 'Monthly Average Rainfall', Axes and labels styling: X-axis title color: blue, Y-axis title color: green, font size: 14px, Data series: Series name: 'Rainfall', data: [49.9, 71.5, 106.4, 129.2, 144.0, 176.0, 135.6, 148.5, 216.4, 194.1, 95.6, 54.4], Custom colors: Series color: #7cb5ec, Additional configurations: Chart background color: #f7f7f7, legend disabled, credits disabled, chart margins: 50px top, 100px right, 50px bottom, 100px left.
visualization_explanation: The provided Highcharts chartOptions object is configured to render a spline chart titled 'Monthly Average Rainfall'. The chart includes an X-axis with categories for each month and a Y-axis. The X-axis title is styled with a blue color and a font size of 14px, while the Y-axis title is styled with a green color and the same font size. The chart's background color is set to a light gray (#f7f7f7), and the legend and credits are disabled. The chart has custom margins set to 50px top and bottom, and 100px left and right. The data series is named 'Rainfall' and includes monthly rainfall data, with the series color set to a light blue (#7cb5ec).
